Help:Node.title: General Concepts: Friends
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Friends (pending)
Important Commands: none yet
Castle Marrach will eventually contain friend lists, so that you can get a list of where your friends are online (provided that they're in public places).
When multiple games become available at Skotos, this functionality will be generalized, so that you can see which games your friends are logged in to.
These features have not yet been implemented, but are expected in the future.
See Also: Custom
